languages.text: "Благородное деяние. Пускай команда вознесет молитвы о герое, отринувшем нечистую жизнь во имя Человечества".
"A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Благородное деяние. Пускай команда вознесет молитвы о герое, отринувшем нечистую жизнь во имя Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “何等崇高的善行。愿全体船员一同为这位英雄祈祷，他以人类的名义，自愿放弃了被玷污的性命。”
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “何等崇高的善行。愿全体船员一同为这位英雄祈祷，他以人类的名义，自愿放弃了被玷污的性命。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Il a agi avec honneur. Que l'équipage offre quelques prières en hommage au héros qui, au nom de l'humanité, a renoncé à sa vie impure. »
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Il a agi avec honneur. Que l'équipage offre quelques prières en hommage au héros qui, au nom de l'humanité, a renoncé à sa vie impure. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Un acto noble. Permita que la tripulación ofrezca una plegaria por el héroe que renunció a su vida impura en nombre de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Un acto noble. Permita que la tripulación ofrezca una plegaria por el héroe que renunció a su vida impura en nombre de la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「崇高な行いだったわ。人類のために不純な生活を捨てた英雄のために、クルーで祈りを捧げよう」
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「崇高な行いだったわ。人類のために不純な生活を捨てた英雄のために、クルーで祈りを捧げよう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eine noble Tat. Die Crew soll für den Helden beten, der im Namen der Menschheit seinem unreinen Leben abgeschworen hat."
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Eine noble Tat. Die Crew soll für den Helden beten, der im Namen der Menschheit seinem unreinen Leben abgeschworen hat."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."

languages.text: "Asil bir icraat. Mürettebat, İnsanlık uğruna günahkâr yaşamından vazgeçen kahraman için dualar etsin."
languages.original_text: "A noble deed. Let the crew offer prayers for the hero who renounced his impure life in the name of Humanity."
